feed.title: Webtop Releases

entry.title: New release for Webtop: c0088954-ls233
entry.content:
CI Report:

https://ci-tests.linuxserver.io/linuxserver/webtop/c0088954-ls233/index.html

LinuxServer Changes:

Rebase all images to Selkies, drop openbox and icewm, bump Alpine to 3.22, bump Fedora to 42.

Remote Changes:

Updating base packages to c0088954
